document.full_text: yemeni forces fired at protesters blockading a government building on monday, killing a shopkeeper and three protesters in taiz, a city that has seen some of the largest demonstrations against president ali abdullah saleh, witnesses said.
document.title: four dead as security forces fire on yemen protest
lines_and_colors: yemeni forces fired at protesters blockading a government building on monday, killing a shopkeeper and three protesters in taiz, a city that has seen some of the largest demonstrations against president ali abdullah saleh, witnesses said.
